mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING(a.create_time,1,8) stat_date,count(*) favorite_count FROM tbl_store_visit_hist a LEFT JOIN tbl_store_info b ON a.store_id = b.store_id WHERE a.create_time like CONCAT(#{stat_date},'%') AND a.store_id=#{store_id}

SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(a.create_time,9,2),':00') stat_date,count(*) favorite_count FROM tbl_store_visit_hist a LEFT JOIN tbl_store_info b ON a.store_id = b.store_id WHERE a.create_time like CONCAT(#{stat_date},'%') AND a.store_id=#{store_id} GROUP BY SUBSTRING(a.create_time,9,2)
